caption.p: Distribution of compound classes in lignin oil and processed streams

Comparison of distributions of compound classes in the lignin oil, liquid products from the hydroprocessing of lignin oil in the presence of the 15%Ni/Nb 2O 5 catalyst, and control experiment (no added catalyst). Reaction conditions for each cycle: lignin bio-oil (2 g), n-pentane (100 mL, solvent), catalyst (0.400 g), H 2 pressure of 7 MPa (at room temperature), 16 h at 300°C, stirring rate of 400 rpm.
